name: Asymmetry (3147561dev)
description:
Developer Note: The version you see here is currently an Alpha build of the game, which my team and I hope to be able to update, with more features. Planned upcoming features include:

More Maps: Hellscape, Gridlock, Desktop, and Rooftops.

More Weapons: Assault Rifles, Shotgun, Sniper

More Modes: Currently, online Multiplayer is not supported within the current build of Asymmetry, meaning single player is currently the only playable mode. However, the abiltiy to play Asymmetry online will be added in a future update!

Welcome to Asymmetry, a game where players are given the option to play in one of three modes. The modes are as follows:
Survival: Survive for as long as you can against a never ending horde.
Multiplayer: Compete against friends online in intense multiplayer action.
Asymmetry: Team up with two other players to defeat a player utilizing a VR headset. (Requires a VR Headset)

Just download the game and enjoy!

Controls:
WASD / Gamepad Left Thumbstick: Move
Space / Gamepad Button South: Jump
Mouse / Gamepad Right Thumbstick: Camera
Left Mouse Button / Gamepad Right Trigger: Fire
